name: Get_Hotel_Facilities

docs_row.name: Get_Hotel_Facilities
docs_row.func_description: Retrieves a list of facilities and services (e.g., pool, gym, Wi-Fi) offered by a specified hotel, with optional filtering by date and language.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_summary:
The accommodation offers several facilities and highlights to enhance your stay. Among the general amenities, you'll find a designated smoking area, though the pricing details for its use are unspecified. Air conditioning is available free of charge, ensuring comfort during your visit. The property maintains a non-smoking policy throughout most areas, though the specifics of any charges related to this are not detailed.  

Key highlights of the accommodation include internet services for staying connected, non-smoking rooms for a fresh environment, and room service for added convenience. The facilities are categorized under general amenities, some room-specific features, and layout details, though no further summaries are provided for these groups. Overall, the property focuses on comfort and convenience with essential services and a smoke-free environment.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for travelers evaluating hotel amenities before booking. It retrieves detailed facility information for a specific hotel, including general amenities (e.g., air conditioning, smoking areas), room features (e.g., non-smoking rooms, internet), and service highlights (e.g., room service). The response helps users assess comfort and convenience factors, with optional filtering by stay dates and language preferences. The hotel ID must be obtained from SearchHotels APIs.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates endpoints.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Filters facilities available from the check-in date.
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Filters facilities available until the check-out date.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

accommodationHighlights.description: An array of accommodation highlights, currently empty in this response.

facilities.description: A list of facilities available at the accommodation.

ar_items.description: An object representing a facility and its details.

id.description: The unique identifier for the facility.

groupId.description: The group ID to which the facility belongs.

instances.description: A list of instances of the facility.

ar_items.description: An object representing a specific instance of the facility.

title.description: The title or name of the facility instance (e.g., 'Designated smoking area').

subFacilities.description: A list of sub-facilities related to this instance, currently empty.

attributes.description: An object containing additional attributes of the facility instance.

name.description: The name of the facility, if specified (null in this case).

paymentInfo.description: An object containing payment-related information for the facility.

chargeMode.description: The charge mode for the facility (e.g., 'FREE', 'UNKNOWN_CHARGE_MODE').

closureScheduleDuringStay.description: A list of closure schedules during the stay, currently empty.

scheduleEntry.description: A list of schedule entries, currently empty.

extendedAttributes.description: Extended attributes for the facility, if any (null in this case).

highlights.description: A list of key highlights of the accommodation.

ar_items.description: An object representing a highlight of the accommodation.

instances.description: A list of instances of the highlight.

ar_items.description: An object representing a specific instance of the highlight.

title.description: The title or name of the highlight instance (e.g., 'Internet services').

facilityGroups.description: A list of facility groups available at the accommodation.

ar_items.description: An object representing a facility group.

id.description: The unique identifier for the facility group.

title.description: The title or name of the facility group (e.g., 'General', 'Some rooms').

summary.description: A summary of the facility group, if any (null in this case).
